snippet.title: Santa's Reindeer Run Game mobile game
snippet.description:
Santa's Reindeer Game is available for iOS on iTunes and Android on GooglePlay.
Touching the screen makes the sleigh dive and gain speed, and then using the hills it gets airborne again! Unlocking reindeer increases the number of presents Santa can haul and also increases the speed of the sleigh. Collecting candy canes activates Sugar Rush mode for an additional burst of speed. Santa will need that extra power because he has to deliver the presents before morning or it's game over!
